title: Proof Grails Protoglyph and the Secret of the Pig Numbers Treasure Hunt
description: In this episode of Proof, Ryan Carson joins Andrew Badr and Apely.eth from the Proof Collective on Twitter Spaces. They retell the incredible treasure hunting story that took the NFT world by storm on March 14th, 2022. The discovery and decryption of a hidden message in the image of Proof Grails #11 (Protoglyph) led a group of friends down an epic treasure hunting rabbit hole.
dc:creator: Kevin Rose
